DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effect concomitant administration estradiol use clomiphene citrate ( CC ) induction ovulation infertile woman .
DOC.brief_title: Concomitant CC E2 Versus CC Alone Ovulation Induction
DOC.detailed_description: Women randomly divide two group ; CC-E2 group CC group . Women CC-E2 group receive CC ( 100 mg/day 5 consecutive day day 2 cycle ) estradiol ( 2 mg/day 5 consecutive day day 2 cycle ) . Women CC group receive CC ( 100 mg/day 5 consecutive day day 2 cycle ) placebo mimic estradiol ( 5 consecutive day day 2 cycle ) . Transvaginal sonography ( TVS ) scan perform regularly monitor follicular growth ( folliculometry ) ; start day 10 stimulation cycle repeat every 2-3 day . When least one follicle ≥ 18 mm diameter , final oocyte maturation induce intramuscular administration 10000 IU human chorionic gonadotropin ( HCG ) time intercourse advise . If follicle ≥ 12 mm day 16 cycle , monitor follicular growth discontinue cycle presumed anovulatory . Ovulation document TVS scan one week trigger oocyte maturation confirm assess midluteal serum progesterone level . Each woman subject ovarian stimulation maximum 3 consecutive cycle except get pregnant first second cycle .
DOC.criteria: Infertile woman eugonadotrophic anovulation/oligoovulation . Unexplained infertility . Age < 20 > 35 year . Body mass index ( BMI ) < 18.5 kg/m2 > 25 kg/m2 . Presence infertility factor anovulation/oligoovulation . Previous history ovarian surgery surgical removal one ovary . Previous exposure cytotoxic drug pelvic irradiation . Metabolic hormonal abnormality .
